Class CommonBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.CommonBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
iCommonBoard, Serializable
public class CommonBoard extends Object implements iCommonBoard
CommonBoard handles the component piles durning the building phase of the game. Contains a queue of components not yet revealed, and an array of uncovered components, Accessed and visible to the players
See Also:
